posts.post_title: (SOLD) T3 Turkey Red Ty Cobb SGC10 (Very Nice Eye Appeal For a 1!)
posts.post_content:
(SOLD) T3 Turkey Red Ty Cobb SGC10 (Very Nice Eye Appeal For a 1!)

Great colour, registration and corners on this SGC graded Cobb - even the crease does not overly interfere with the eye appeal or the image of Cobb himself.

SGC No: 1367143-039
